AirportConditionDefinitions.Text: DEPARTING AIRCRAFT MAKE INITIAL CONTACT WITH MANCHESTER DELIVERY ON 121.700.
DEPARTING AIRCRAFT MAKE INITIAL CONTACT WITH MANCHESTER GROUND ON 121.850.
DEPARTING AIRCRAFT MAKE INITIAL CONTACT WITH MANCHESTER TOWER ON 118.625.

NotamDefinitions.Text: ATC LOW VISIBILITY PROCEDURES IN FORCE. USE CAT TWO THREE HOLDING POINTS. ARRIVING AIRCRAFT CHECK YOUR MINIMA.
DATALINK CLEARANCES AVAILABLE. PDC ADDRESS EGCC.
